name: VanGrowth
description: ### MVP An algorithm visualization tool that takes sampling algorithms and uses them over paintings to create voronoi diagrams using the most common color to each point. Will feature 3 algorithms (Uniform Random, Mitch's Best Candidate, Poisson-disc), how they work, and then live animation of them in action over a painting, while building a voronoi diagram of the most common color around each sample point.
